2100060.name: TurboMania Fog Racers
2100060.description:
DRIVE ON THE EDGE TO BEAT THEM ALL

Truly reckless racing with obstacles, inspired by Ignition. Remember about TURBO - your secret weapon. Show others who's boss in a world of tough racing where the slightest mistake means you lose.

Avoid real-time simulated obstacles (as falling rocks, flying saucers, bulldozers, aircrafts etc.) calculated in real-time thanks to the advanced NVidia PhysX engine, no race will be the same!

The best turbocharged cars and the craziest opponents are waiting to see if you can beat them. Cautious drivers should not report.

Furious and surprising power-ups - ( boosts, slow-down's, bombs and so much more! ) put your pedal to the metal as you race through stylized, varied levels. Collect POTATOES (the main in-game currency) to upgrade your vehicle or buy a better car ( feature available soon). Race in single player mode or in the local split screen ( split screen mode available soon).

Pick one of 8 available cars and try 'em on varied, hand-designed tracks ( + 1 Free Ride mode map ). Each car is characterized by realistic, unique driving behaviour.

Featuring:
- 8 diverse cars to play with, each with unique turbo sounds and realistic driving model, where you can clearly feel the difference in handling
- 3 single player tracks
- 1 freeride map
- up to 5 hours of gameplay time

Pick your car &Show ''em who is BOSS!
